thread.section_title: Saatchi Art Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Saatchi Art | saatchiart.com | 4 of 52
thread.title: Ingrid

author: Ingrid
title: Ingrid
text: I recently purchased Where we Talk About Our Gods by a German artist Christian Bahr and I absolutely love it!! The painting is big and bold and exactly what I needed to give my lounge room a lift. It came beautifully and meticulously packaged in a wooden crate with plenty of bubble wrap and foam to protect the artwork. Saatchi organised the shipping and I did not have to lift a finger! Would definitely recommend this site for buying original artworks.
